com.illcode.meterman

Class KryoPersistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.KryoPersistence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistence

    public final class KryoPersistence
extends Object
implements Persistence
    Uses Kryo to serialize world state.

    Note that if any of the classes referenced in the state changes, then saved data cannot be loaded.
